description: Bisharp, known as the Sharp Sword Pok√©mon, is the evolution of Pawniard. It has a round red and black head resembling a helmet, topped with a gold, double headed axe blade. Bisharp battles a group of Pawniard to establish itself as the leader. Surrounded by the group of Pawniard, they pursue prey, and Bisharp finishes them off.
name: Kirikizan
